meanings.definition: A bacterial infection of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the pyoderma on my arm as a bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: The pyoderma on his leg was treated with antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The pyoderma on the cat's paw made it look like it had a tiny volcano.
meanings.sent4: The pyoderma spread like wildfire through the school, causing concern among parents.
meanings.sent5: The pus-filled pyoderma oozed and smelled unpleasant.

meanings.definition: Inflammation of the skin with pus formation.
meanings.sent1: Her pyoderma caused redness and swelling on her face.
meanings.sent2: The pyoderma on his back was painful and itchy.
meanings.sent3: The pyoderma on the sandwich made it look like it was crying pus tears.
meanings.sent4: The pyoderma of corruption in the government needed to be cleansed.
meanings.sent5: The pyoderma on the tree bark was a stark contrast to its usual smooth texture.
